name: Gmailzen
description: Minimal, clean, reduced and typographically improved Gmail.
additional_info:
No compose button in the eye! hit <kbd>C</kbd> instead.

Suggested Chrome extensions for/with the style:

Short Gmail Labels
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/pbnemfflkolkhamplnhoaljkogfhajaf

Gmail To Trello
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/oceoildfbiaeclndnjknjpfaoofeekgl
